text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I look forward to working with you. 
Then quickly, a strategy meeting.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text: Yeah, let's come up with a strategy.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Durandal and that genius trainer pairing up, huh? 
It'll be a sight to behold.

If it was my Senpai, known as a genius trainer, 
that was stepping up, then it couldn't be helped. 
For today, I'll just observe and study.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text: A short distance battle. Then, the strategy——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: I'd like to go with "Chaser".

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Chaser……? Even though it's short distance? 
I'd heard the rumors but……do you really want to go with that?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, chaser in a short distance race…… 
There's something wrong with that, don't you think……?

"Chaser" is just one of the strategies of racing. 
One where you run in the back of the pack and 
then quickly overtake in the end……

It wasn't suited for short distances where you had 
to compete for position from the very start. As proof 
of this, the greatest sprinters of all time——

Were predominantly "Runner" and "Leader" type Uma Musume. 
Durandal should already know this too……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Even if that's the case, I still want to go with Chaser. 
My greatest weapon is that one moment of "Sharpness".

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I want to make the most of it. 
Your judgement, please.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text: ………Understood.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I'll respect your will. 
On top of that, we should decide on some other things.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Eh, he approved chaser……seriously!?

The flexibility to not impose what is considered standard 
on an Uma Musume. That was Senpai's strength. And so——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Fuuu……!

Whether that decision would be correct or 
not would be determined by race results.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
The pace is slow……if everyone is saving their 
stamina, then chasing becomes disadvantageous……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
But the last 3 furlongs. No matter the pace, 
I will definitely——cut through, faster than anyone.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
As long as I am able to do that——victory will be certain! 
Haaaaaaaaaa!!

You really could practically call it a 『Holy 
Sword』. The slower the pace, the more of an 
advantage those in front would have but……

That kind of sharpness was enough to overcome such a disadvantage. 
To cut through all of her opponents in a single stroke.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Good work. And it looks like you were following 
my instructions for how to take the course.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Yes, it was very easy to run.

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad. Are your legs okay? Just in case, it 
would probably better to ice them. That kind of 
sudden acceleration can put quite a burden on them.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, as expected of a genius trainer. From the way he 
issues orders down to the after care, it's all perfect.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I guess……it's already decided then? 
Looks like we won't even get a chance.

There was no way anyone could be better. As expected, 
the kind of King that Durandal would serve……

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
So, what do you want to do? 
Do you want to formally team up with me?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: About that——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Could you give me a little time to think about it?

text_block_list.name: Formative Trainer
text_block_list.text:
……Understood. I won't force you, 
so take your time and think about it.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ……I apologize.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Wait, wait, she didn't agree immediately? What does that mean? 
Does she really just want to take a moment, or……

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Was there something she didn't like? 
Was readily accepting chaser actually the wrong choice?

I didn't know the answer to that. However, shortly 
after, Durandal officially declined to form a contract 
with my senpai and began searching for another trainer.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Durandal, chaser really is unthinkable for short distances. 
Let's take the initiative with Leader……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I see, I understand what you're thinking. 
Well then——please excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer C
text_block_list.text:
Chaser is……well……it isn't completely impossible I guess. But 
at least, before the 3rd corner let's aim to be more forward……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
But to do that, isn't it like asking me to dull my blade 
before the end? I apologize but……I can't agree to that.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I guess it really won't be that easy. For Durandal to find a King 
that she can acknowledge from the bottom of her heart, I mean.

Fine Motion and I had become friends already 
and were having a chat. If there wasn't a King 
worthy of Durandal in Tracen Academy then……
choice_data_list: I guess someone has to "Become" it
I guess someone has to "Become" it

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Eh, someone has to……become King?

There was nobody at Tracen Academy that 
could surpass my senpai. Which would mean——

If a king could not be found, then the 『Holy Sword』 would only rust. 
Something filled with that much potential would…… In that case——

I had to challenge myself! 
I didn't want that kind of talent to waste away.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: You are……
choice_data_list: Durandal, I came here for a test!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: A test? To test……me?
choice_data_list: No, myself! To see if I'm worthy
No, myself! To see if I'm worthy

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hey hey, that person…… 
Even though that genius wasn't able to form a contract……?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer C
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, they look motivated though. 
But, a rookie outside their own depth……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Understood. Then, please. 
——My temporary King.
